PORTFOLIO BLOG ABOUT RESUME

Welcome

November 10, 2016 — 08:29

 

Welcome to my new website! Hand coded, self-hosted, and hopefully not broken— I am finally done with it.

Right now you will notice there are not that many posts, so check in every so often as I update the portfolio page with completed works and the blog with WIPS and writing. In the meantime, you can check out some postcards I made for UT or you can check out some mac art I created this summer.

There are a few fun parts of the site too. There is a page where you can find all my social media. If you want to ogle my resume or my about page, feel free. There is a really long copyright page if you want to see a lot of typography. You can even make it rain pizza at the 404 page.

Anyways, thank you for stopping by. Let me know if you find something you like!



Wanna share?
